name: Asteroid Devastator
description:
Asteroids Devastator

by: IkonHero Creations.

This is the first game that I ever finished. It's an Asteroids clone with added depth. 

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys = Move ship.

SPACE = shoot.

ENTER = Confirm menu or shop option.

N = Fire Nuke.

ESCAPE = Exit option.

Collect ores to spend on ship upgrades or spare ships.

Values:

- GREY: 500.

- ORANGE: 1000.

- GREEN: 2000.

- YELLOW: 4000.

Upgrade your ship:

Upgrade prices are increasing with each upgrade level

Ship prices are calculated based on your amount of spare ships (50.000 per ship).

Ore magnet range increases the distance to which ores are attracted to your ship.

Sidekicks add extra guns to your ship.

UFOs have a 2/3 chance to drop a shield.

A shield can absorb one bullet and will be consumed upon absorption.

Increasing difficulty for each next sector:

- More asteroids.

- Faster asteroids.

- More large asteroids.

- Increased speed and range for UFO bullets.

Every 7th sector is a boss battle.

Bosses drop nukes when destroyed.

Press "N" to fire a nuke.
